News.Title: Paramatrix Technologies: Hong Kong Subsidiary Acquires 51% Stake in Japanese Company
News.Summary: Paramatrix Technologies Limited's Hong Kong subsidiary is acquiring a 51% stake in Paramatrix Technologies KK, a Japanese company, for ¥5.1 million (approx. ₹29 Lakhs). The acquisition aims to expand international operations and establish presence in the Japanese market. The transaction is expected to be completed by April 5, 2025.
